formattedAddress: 281 Lafayette St, New York, NY 10012, USA
adrFormatAddress: 281 Lafayette St, New York, NY 10012, USA

editorialSummary.text: Artful nightspot featuring a vegetarian supper club, a bar & a moody space for live music.

originalText.text:
This used to be Soviet Art-Deco lounge PRAVDA famous for best drinks in the city and really good finger food turned into upscale lounge/night club. This place has a hype for a quiet some time and is NYC vanity fair at its best. They are following the path of One Oak, making this place super exclusive. You will need to reserve a table and make sure to bring a good ratio of men/girls.  For the 6 guys, they obligated us to get at least 3 bottles.  The initial bill of $2500 got inflated at the end of the night to 4K (we had ordered some drinks from the bar, but still, this jump is pretty steep). The worst part that two of our friends wanted to join our table, but they told us that they had to pay $500 each. But don't get me wrong,  I had a really good night there and lots of fun.  Yes, it was overpriced but pretty solid fun.
So if you want to feel exclusive,  make a reservation, bring some girls, and get ready to pay lots of $

originalText.text:
22usd a pop for a specialty cocktail but the MUSIC is EVERYTHING. The venue is very intimate with a bar area and a basement room for dancing and has a boho vibe to it. Dj Hallex M from Hong Kong was spinning his wicked tribal house all night long. We were on the guest-list and got in right after opening without any waiting.

‚ÄúDress To Impress(style)‚Äù dont say I dont tell ya. It is a Tribe after all.

originalText.text:
Very honest review from a guy who‚Äôs reluctantly been 15+ times and always shows up with my girl and girls. I can never last more than a couple of hours even when I‚Äôm with my good friends. It‚Äôs consistently the worst ratio in the city ‚Äî 85%+ weird creepy burners who do nothing but stare uncontrollably at the 3 hot girls per 100. Even when you spend $10k in the back room (my friend does so regularly and I get dragged along) you end up trying so hard to dance to some of the worst deep house djs it sucks. Every. Single. Time.

Totally respect the owners game making $ on weirdos on K, but unless you are one do yourself a favor and skip it.
